text: ADMINS MAY BE RECEIVING COPIES OF OUTBOUND EMAIL TO EXTERNAL PARTIES ORIGINATING FROM OTHER USERS IN THEIR ORGANIZATION ID: EX682041 Issue type: Advisory Status Investigating Impacted services Exchange Online Details Title: Admins may be receiving copies of outbound email to external parties originating from other users in their organization User impact: Admins may be receiving copies of outbound email to external parties originating from other users in their organization Current status: We are currently investing customer reports of an issue where Global Tenant Admins may be receiving an unexpected volume of copies of outbound external email originating from other users their organization and marked as potential spam. We will provide an update within 60 minutes. ---- Steve Yates ITS, Inc. %40BN7PR08MB5506.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: OT: If your admin is getting copies of all sent emails
